title: TRAIN MINER
description: All aboard for endless mining fun in Train Miner â€“ expand, upgrade, and dominate the tracks! Train Miner is a unique and addictive resource-mining game where you control a train on a looping track, automatically harvesting valuable resources nearby. As you mine, the track expands, unlocking new areas and boosting your profits. Sell your resources, upgrade your train, and watch it grow longer and faster with each run! With a perfect blend of strategy, automation, and satisfying progression, Train Miner keeps you hooked as you build the ultimate mining empire on rails. So hop on board, mine, and expand your railway empire in Train Miner!
